TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComboBox/ObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ComboBox.ObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表 中項目的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會封裝中的項目。The class encapsulates the items in the . 下拉式方塊的物件集合可用來管理許多類型的物件，包括字串、 影像和自訂商務物件。The object collection of a combo box can be used to manage many types of objects, including strings, images, and custom business objects. 您可以在數種方式中的集合中加入項目。You can add items to the collection in several ways. 方法會將一個物件加入至集合。The method adds one object to the collection. 若要加入集合中的物件數目，最好是建立項目的陣列，並使用指派方法。To add a number of objects to the collection, it is best to create an array of items and assign with the method. 若要在集合內的特定位置插入物件，您可以使用方法。To insert an object at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要移除已知的索引處的項目集合中可以使用其中一個方法或方法。To remove items at a known index in the collection you can use either the method or the method. 方法從集合中移除所有項目。The method removes all the items from the collection. 方法和屬性的加入和移除項目，除了也提供方法來尋找集合中的項目。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items within the collection. 方法可讓您判斷物件是否為集合的成員。The method enables you to determine if an object is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道項目位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷項目位於集合。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法建立這個類別的執行個體，而不將它與控制項。An instance of this class cannot be created without associating it with a control.

param.span: 物件，表示要加入至集合中的項目。

span.span: An object representing the item to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將項目加入至 的項目清單。

span.span: Adds an item to the list of items for a .

returns.span: 集合中的項目之以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將項目加入至下拉式方塊。This method adds an item to the combo box. 如果的屬性設定為`true`，依字母順序的項目插入至清單。If the property of the is set to `true`, the item is inserted into the list alphabetically. 否則，在清單結尾處插入項目。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 下拉式方塊中，會顯示項目的視覺表示法。A visual representation of the item is displayed in the combo box. 這個內容表示由屬性。This content representation is specified by the property. 如果屬性是`null`，將項目的`ToString`方法呼叫以取得字串，顯示在下拉式方塊中; 否則即為所指定的預存物件的屬性屬性會顯示。If the property is `null`, the item's `ToString` method is called to obtain the string that is displayed in the combo box; otherwise, the property of the stored object as specified by the property is displayed. A如果空間不足，無法存放新項目就會發生。A occurs if there is insufficient space available to store the new item. 若要將一組項目新增至下拉式方塊，建議您最好使用方法。To add a set of items to the combo box it is best to use the method. 如果您選擇使用方法新增至下拉式方塊的項目數目，請使用暫停期間您加入重新繪製的方法和方法，以恢復重新繪製。If you choose to use the method to add a number of items to the combo box, use the method to suspend repainting during your add and the method to resume repainting. 您可以使用方法，以在其中加入一個項目清單中指定的位置。You can use the method to specify the location in the list where an item is added. 將物件加入至集合中，當呼叫物件的方法，以取得要顯示在清單中的字串。When an object is added to the collection, the calls the object's method to obtain the string to display in the list.

summary.span: 將項目陣列加入至 項目清單中。

span.span: Adds an array of items to the list of items for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設為 true，項目插入清單依字母順序。If the property of the is set to true, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否則，項目會插入在陣列中出現的順序。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order they occur within the array. 這個方法通常會傳遞的陣列物件，而陣列的任何型別的物件可以傳遞至這個方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 當將物件加入至集合時，此方法會呼叫物件的方法，以取得要顯示在清單中的字串。When an object is added to the collection, the method calls the object's method to obtain the string to display in the list. 使用此方法時將項目新增至集合，您不需要呼叫和來最佳化效能的方法。When using this method to add items to the collection, you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制項，將文字屬性設定，並使用方法來填入。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a control by setting the text property and using the method to populate the . 它也會示範如何處理事件。It also demonstrates handling the event. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`InitializeComboBox`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeComboBox` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/VB/form1.vb#2)]
